meanings.sent1: The multihandicapped child needed extra support in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The multihandicapped student excelled in art despite their challenges.
meanings.sent3: The multihandicapped puppy tried to chase its tail, but kept stumbling over its own paws.
meanings.sent4: Her multihandicapped car struggled to make it up the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The multihandicapped tree, with its twisted branches, stood out in the forest.

meanings.definition: A person with more than one physical or mental impairment.
meanings.sent1: The multihandicapped individual received specialized care at the facility.
meanings.sent2: The multihandicapped student had a positive attitude despite their challenges.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the multihandicapped superhero wore a cape made of blankets.
meanings.sent4: Her multihandicapped computer struggled to keep up with the latest software updates.
meanings.sent5: The multihandicapped athlete inspired others with their determination to succeed.
